briefTitle: Multimodal Pain Management After Robotic-Assisted Total Laparoscopic Hysterectomy

armGroups.label: Prospective cohort
interventionNames: Procedure: Local anesthetic injection with ropivacaine at abdominal laparoscopic port sites

interventions.name: Local anesthetic injection with ropivacaine at abdominal laparoscopic port sites

eligibilityModule.eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Women undergoing robotic-assisted total laparoscopic hysterectomy, with or without bilateral salpingo-oophorectomy
* Uterine weight â‰¤325 grams

Exclusion Criteria:

* contraindication to any study medications (h/o gastric bypass, gastric ulcers, CKD)
* current opioid prescription

outcomeMeasures.title: Total Opioid Pain Medications Required 0-3h Post op in Morphine Milligram Equivalents (MME)
outcomeMeasures.description: Total opioid pain medications required 0-3h post op in morphine milligram equivalents (MME)

outcomeMeasures.title: Total Opioid Pain Medications Required Through 3-24h Post op in MME
outcomeMeasures.description: Total opioid pain medications required through 3-24h post op in MME

outcomeMeasures.title: Pain Scores
outcomeMeasures.description: Subjective, Score 0-10 with 0 being no pain and 10 being severe pain

outcomeMeasures.description: Subjective, Score 0-10 with 0 being no pain and 10 being severe pain

outcomeMeasures.title: Number of Patients With Return to the Clinic, Emergency Department Due to Post Operative Pain Within a 2 Week Period
